		0: Instruction<=32'b00001000000000000000000000000011;	//j Main
		1: Instruction<=32'b00001000000000000000000001001011;	//j Interruption
		2: Instruction<=32'b00001000000000000000000001010000;	//j Exception
		3: Instruction<=32'b00100000000111010000000000000000;	//Main:    addi $sp,$zero,0
		4: Instruction<=32'b00111100000010000100000000000000;	//lui $t0,16384
		5: Instruction<=32'b10101101000000000000000000001000;	//sw $zero,8($t0)
		6: Instruction<=32'b00111100000010011000100010001000;	//lui $t1,34952
		7: Instruction<=32'b00100001001010011000100010001000;	//addi $t1,$t1,34952
		8: Instruction<=32'b10101101000010010000000000000000;	//sw $t1,0($t0)
		9: Instruction<=32'b00111100000010011111111111111111;	//lui $t1,65535
		10:Instruction<=32'b00100001001010011111111111111111;	//addi $t1,$t1,65535
		11:Instruction<=32'b10101101000010010000000000000100;	//sw $t1,4($t0)		
		12:Instruction<=32'b00100000000010010000000000000011;	//addi $t1,$zero,3
		13:Instruction<=32'b10101101000010010000000000001000;	//sw $t1,8($t0)
		14:Instruction<=32'b00100000000010010000000000000011;	//addi $t1,$zero,3
		15:Instruction<=32'b10101101000010010000000000100000;	//sw $t1,32($t0)
		16:Instruction<=32'b10001101000010010000000000100000;	//load_number1:    lw $t1,32($t0) 	
		17:Instruction<=32'b00110001001010100000000000001000;	//andi $t2,$t1,8		 
		18:Instruction<=32'b00010000000010101111111111111101;	//beq $t2,$zero,load_number1 
		19:Instruction<=32'b10001101000100000000000000011100;	//lw $s0,28($t0)		
		20:Instruction<=32'b10001101000010010000000000100000;	//load_number2:    lw $t1,32($t0)
		21:Instruction<=32'b00110001001010100000000000001000;	//andi $t2,$t1,8
		22:Instruction<=32'b00010000000010101111111111111101;	//beq $t2,$zero,load_number2
		23:Instruction<=32'b10001101000100010000000000011100;	//lw $s1,28($t0)		
		24:Instruction<=32'b00111100000011000011111111111111;	//lui $t4,16383
		25:Instruction<=32'b00100001100011001111110000000000;	//addi $t4,$t4,64512
		26:Instruction<=32'b00000010000011000100100000100000;	//add $t1,$s0,$t4
		27:Instruction<=32'b10001101001100100000000000000000;	//lw $s2,0($t1)
		28:Instruction<=32'b00000010001011000100100000100000;	//add $t1,$s1,$t4
		29:Instruction<=32'b10001101001100110000000000000000;	//lw $s3,0($t1)
		30:Instruction<=32'b00000010000000000010000000100000;	//add $a0,$s0,$zero
		31:Instruction<=32'b00000010001000000010100000100000;	//add $a1,$s1,$zero
		32:Instruction<=32'b00010000101001000000000000000111;	//compare:    beq $a0,$a1,exit
		33:Instruction<=32'b00000000101001000110000000100010;	//sub $t4,$a1,$a0
		34:Instruction<=32'b01001001100000000000000000000011;	//bltz $t4,minus
		35:Instruction<=32'b00000000100000000100100000100000;	//add $t1,$a0,$zero
		36:Instruction<=32'b00000000101000000010000000100000;	//add $a0,$a1,$zero
		37:Instruction<=32'b00000001000000000010100000100000;	//add $a1,$t0,$zero
		38:Instruction<=32'b00000000100001010010000000100010;	//minus:    sub $a0,$a0,$a1
		39:Instruction<=32'b00001000000000000000000000100000;	//j compare
		40:Instruction<=32'b10001101000010010000000000100000;	//exit:    lw $t1,32($t0) 	
		41:Instruction<=32'b00110001001010100000000000000100;	//andi $t2,$t1,4		 
		42:Instruction<=32'b00010000000010101111111111111101;	//beq $t2,$zero,exit
		43:Instruction<=32'b10101101000001000000000000011000;	//sw $a0,24($t0)
		44:Instruction<=32'b10101101000001000000000000001100;	//display_result:    sw $a0,12($t0)
		45:Instruction<=32'b00000000000100100101011001000000;	//decode1:    sll $t2,$s2,25
		46:Instruction<=32'b00000000000010100101011001000010;	//srl $t2,$t2,25
		47:Instruction<=32'b00000000000100110101111001000000;	//sll $t3,$s3,25
		48:Instruction<=32'b00000000000010110101101110000010;	//srl $t3,$t3,14
		49:Instruction<=32'b00100001010010100000000010000000;	//addi $t2,$t2,128
		50:Instruction<=32'b00000001010010110101000000100000;	//add $t2,$t2,$t3
		51:Instruction<=32'b10101101000010100000000000010100;	//sw $t2,20($t0)
		52:Instruction<=32'b00001100000000000000000001001011;	//jal Interruption
		53:Instruction<=32'b00000000000100100101010010000000;	//decode2:    sll $t2,$s2,18
		54:Instruction<=32'b00000000000010100101011001000010;	//srl $t2,$t2,25
		55:Instruction<=32'b00000000000100110101110010000000;	//sll $t3,$s3,18
		56:Instruction<=32'b00000000000010110101111001000010;	//srl $t3,$t3,25
		57:Instruction<=32'b00000000000010110101101011000000;	//sll $t3,$t3,11
		58:Instruction<=32'b00100001010010100000000100000000;	//addi $t2,$t2,256
		59:Instruction<=32'b00000001010010110101000000100000;	//add $t2,$t2,$t3
		60:Instruction<=32'b10101101000010100000000000010100;	//sw $t2,20($t0)
		61:Instruction<=32'b00001100000000000000000001001011;	//jal Interruption
		62:Instruction<=32'b00000000000100100101001011000000;	//decode3:    sll $t2,$s2,11
		63:Instruction<=32'b00000000000010100101011001000010;	//srl $t2,$t2,25
		64:Instruction<=32'b00000000000100110101101011000000;	//sll $t3,$s3,11
		65:Instruction<=32'b00000000000010110101111001000010;	//srl $t3,$t3,25
		66:Instruction<=32'b00000000000010110101101011000000;	//sll $t3,$t3,11
		67:Instruction<=32'b00100001010010100000001000000000;	//addi $t2,$t2,512
		68:Instruction<=32'b00000001010010110101000000100000;	//add $t2,$t2,$t3
		69:Instruction<=32'b10101101000010100000000000010100;	//sw $t2,20($t0)
		70:Instruction<=32'b00001100000000000000000001001011;	//jal Interruption
		71:Instruction<=32'b00100000000010100000010000000000;	//decode4:    addi $t2,$zero,1024
		72:Instruction<=32'b10101101000010100000000000010100;	//sw $t2,20($t0)
		73:Instruction<=32'b00001100000000000000000001001011;	//jal Interruption
		74:Instruction<=32'b00001100000000000000000000101101;	//jal decode1
		75:Instruction<=32'b10001101000010010000000000001000;	//Interruption:    lw $t1,8($t0)
		76:Instruction<=32'b00100000000010010000000000000001;	//addi $t1,$zero,1
		77:Instruction<=32'b10101101000010010000000000001000;	//sw $t1,8($t0)
		78:Instruction<=32'b00000000000000000000000000000000;	//sll $zero,$zero,0
		79:Instruction<=32'b00000011111000000000000000001000;	//jr $ra
		80:Instruction<=32'b00000000000000000000000000000000;	//Exception:    sll $zero,$zero,0
